name: Day of the Dead ... zombie infection game (Canceled)
blurb: From leading game studio  2 FunGuys comes the epic Zombie infection game Day of the Dead. Join us in our first Kickstarter project

rewards.reward: Back our project and you will appear in the credits under the heading "Our fantastic Kickstarter backers who we want to gratuitously thank for their support" and you will receive a free commemorative limited edition (limited to however many people back the project) T/Shirt which is priceless.

You will have an individual Zombie named after you (or your ex girlfriend or boyfriend) and it will appear in the game. Of course there are boy and girl zombies and we will make sure you have one of the better looking ones :) Now this my friends is priceless - take a screen shot of your Zombie and share it with your friends and use it as your profile pic. 

But wait thats not all, we will even print a rare and limited edition print of your zombie signed by the team who design the game and rush it to your door.

But wait ... there's more ... not only will you appear in the game credits under the heading "Kickstarter supporters who we want to gratuitously thank for their wonderful support" and receive a limited edition print signed by the team, you will also receive a free T/Shirt which is priceless to commemorate your awsesomeness and good taste in games.

OK now this level of support is only reserved for those who want to milk every last drop of opportunity life has to offer, for you my friends we are talking about having a class of Zombie named after you. (I just hope your name isn't Englebert .... ) If you support this project at the mega awesome level and have always wanted a Zombie class named after you then today is the day that fortune and fate comes a knocking on your front door friends. 

We will create a wonderful zombie class in your honor, your zombie class will infect gazillions of human characters and be on millions (we hope) of mobile phones and people the world over will be in awe of your magnanimous nature and ability to infect humans.

If you haven't found fame and fortune in your life as yet - find it in the afterlife as the undead with this Kickstarter project.

We will also send you a framed limited edition print (limited to 1) of your Zombie Class with a special inscription plaque to commemorate your awesomeness and it will be signed by the entire team who makes this project. 

Oh and you'll also appear in the credits under the heading "The rarest of rare Kickstarter backers who we want to gratuitously thank for their support" along with a photo of you or your dog or even you and your  dog and you will receive a two free T/Shirts which are priceless.
